meanings.definition: The transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves of radio frequency, especially those carrying sound messages.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to the radio in the car.
meanings.sent2: The radio in our house picks up many stations.
meanings.sent3: The radio seemed to play only songs about cheese all day.
meanings.sent4: Her voice traveled through the room like a radio signal.
meanings.sent5: The radio hummed with the latest news updates.

meanings.definition: A device for receiving radio broadcasts.
meanings.sent1: My dad bought a new radio for the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The old radio crackled with static.
meanings.sent3: The radio on the shelf started telling jokes unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat like a radio tuning in to a distant station.
meanings.sent5: The radio on the bedside table woke him up every morning.
